entry.title: Creating Lasting Change
entry.summary:
Description

The Nature of Organisations, People, and how to Change Them

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/aurynn

Sat Aug 3 09:20:00 2019 at Cockle Bay

entry.title: When Do We Belong?
entry.summary:
Description

Impostor syndrome and feelings of alienation are rampant in the tech communities, and it's hard to understand why, or how to fight it. Drawing on her DevOps background and using Contempt Culture as a lens, aurynn analyses how tech culture builds group membership and constructs outgroups, how these dynamics reinforce impostor syndrome, and what we can do about it.

entry.title: Why Salt?
entry.summary:
Description

DevOps is a growing movement in the tech community, and configuration management is a huge necessity for doing DevOps well. In this talk, we'll be talking about why you should use the SaltStack configuration management platform in your environment, versus the other major platforms of Puppet and Chef.

entry.title: Let's Learn Twisted Python
entry.summary:
Summary

Let's Learn Twisted is a short 3-hour tutorial covering the basics of writing a Twisted Python client-server application using Twisted Python's Factory and Endpoint APIs to construct a peer-to-peer chat and RPC network.
